scripts.report:generate: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const date = new Date(); const formattedDate = `${String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}.${String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}.${date.getFullYear()}`; const env = process.env.ENV || 'default'; execSync(`npx marge cypress/reports/mochawesome.json --reportDir cypress/reports --reportFilename mochawesome-${env}-${formattedDate}`);"
scripts.test:report: npm run test:run && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.test:report:stableEnv: npm run test:run:stableEnv && npm run report:merge && ENV=stableEnv npm run report:generate
scripts.test:report:brokenEnv: npm run test:run:brokenEnv && npm run report:merge && ENV=brokenEnv npm run report:generate
